jobDescription: Build MERN features, REST APIs, and dashboards; collaborate with UI/UX; write clean, testable code.
Ship cross-platform mobile apps, integrate APIs, optimize performance, and handle Play Store/App Store releases.
Design scalable Node.js services, MongoDB schemas, queues, and CI/CD pipelines; ensure security and observability.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and design systems; handoff to devs; maintain accessibility and brand consistency.
Lead SEO/SEM, paid ads, social and content; track KPIs; manage budgets and conversion optimization.
Own CI/CD, Docker/K8s, monitoring, and infra as code; improve reliability, cost, and deployment speed.
Build automated test suites (Web/Mobile/API), maintain pipelines, and ensure high coverage and stability.
Clean and analyze data, build dashboards, and deliver insights to drive marketing and product decisions.
